children.name: drop
Example - modify the dropTarget and draggable element on successful drop

children.description: Fired when draggable is dropped over one of the drop targets.The `drop` event represents a jQuery `mouseup` event and contains all the event data of the [jQuery Event Object](http://api.jquery.com/category/events/event-object/).

children.name: dragleave
Example - modify the hint element on dragenter

children.description: Fired when draggable moves out of one of the drop targets.The `dragleave` event represents a jQuery `mousemove` event and contains all the event data of the [jQuery Event Object](http://api.jquery.com/category/events/event-object/).

children.name: dragenter
Example - modify the hint element on dragenter

children.description: Fired when draggable moves over one of the drop targets.The `dragenter` event represents a jQuery `mousemove` event and contains all the event data of the [jQuery Event Object](http://api.jquery.com/category/events/event-object/).

children.name: filter
children.description: Selector to filter the drop targets in the area. Every matched element acts as a drop target and fires events on the DropTargetArea. **Specifying the filter is mandatory.**

children.name: group
children.description: Used to group sets of draggable and drop targets. A draggable with the same group value as a drop target will be accepted by the drop target.
